page.title: 05Car Owners in Horwich
page.content:
In the area the majority of families have two cars. The most popular make of car driven is{FORD.}This beats it's nearest rival, the{VAUXHALL}by over 50 percent. There is a range of thirty eight different models of car found in the area.
As would be expected the more expensive car such as the{MG {sports car}is one of the least popular choices. The cars which are expensive tend to be the{saloon car}type suitable for both office and home use.
The families with two cars have one car for father to use for going to work and the other for mother to go shopping and take the children to school.
